title: Dear Zeit People 3/19: Quarantine Life, Spring, Oak Park
itunes:title: Dear Zeit People 3/19: Quarantine Life, Spring, Oak Park
description:
On this edition of Dear Zeit People Jack and Miles discuss Quarantine Life and what people are doing, it's officially the first day of Spring, and a suburb in Chicago has made a Shelter in Place rule.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
